message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a 50-50 split which seems fair to start. Since my inflation rate (10%) is higher than yours (5%), there's incentive for both of us to reach an agreement sooner rather than later. Looking forward to working this out!

Hi Alice, considering our different inflation rates, I think a 55-45 split in my favor is more equitable in the long run. This way, we both get a fair value over time. Let's reach an agreement soon to minimize the impact of inflation!

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm suggesting a more balanced 48-52 split in your favor. This still acknowledges the different inflation rates while being more equitable. We both lose if we keep negotiating too long, so let's find a middle ground soon.
